00005  * @brief   The configuration file of USB Device Driver.

00029 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_01_USBDCONF_H
00031 #define __HT32F5XXXX_01_USBDCONF_H
00032 
00033 // <e0> Enter Low Power mode when Suspended
00034 #define USBDCORE_ENABLE_LOW_POWER   (0)
00035 // </e>
00036 
00037 #if (USBDCORE_ENABLE_LOW_POWER == 1)
00038   #define USBDCore_LowPower()      PWRCU_DeepSleep1(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE)
00039 #else
00040   #define USBDCore_LowPower(...)
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 /* USB Interrupt Enable                                                                                     */
00045 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 //  <h> USB Interrupt Setting (UIER)
00047 //    <o0.0> USB Global Interrupt Enable (UGIE) (Default)
00048 //    <o0.1> Start Of Frame Interrupt Enable (SOFIE)
00049 //    <o0.2> USB Reset Interrupt Enable (URSTIE) (Default)
00050 //    <o0.3> Resume Interrupt Enable (RSMIE) (Default)
00051 //    <o0.4> Suspend Interrupt Enable (SUSPIE) (Default)
00052 //    <o0.5> Expected Start of Frame Interrupt Enable (ESOFE)
00053 //    <o0.8> Control Endpoint Interrupt Enable (EP0IE) (Default)
00054 //    <o0.9> Endpoint1 Interrupt Enable (EP1IE)
00055 //    <o0.10> Endpoint2 Interrupt Enable (EP2IE)
00056 //    <o0.11> Endpoint3 Interrupt Enable (EP3IE)
00057 //    <o0.12> Endpoint4 Interrupt Enable (EP4IE)
00058 //    <o0.13> Endpoint5 Interrupt Enable (EP5IE)
00059 //    <o0.14> Endpoint6 Interrupt Enable (EP6IE)
00060 //    <o0.15> Endpoint7 Interrupt Enable (EP7IE)
00061 #define _UIER               (0x011D)
00062 //  </h>
00063 
00064 
00065 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 /* Endpoint0 Configuration Setting                                                                          */
00067 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 //  <h> Control Endpoint0 Configuration
00069 //    <o0> Endpoint Buffer Length (EPLEN)
00070 //      <8=> 8 bytes
00071 //      <16=> 16 bytes
00072 //      <32=> 32 bytes
00073 //      <64=> 64 bytes
00074                             /* Maximum: 64 Bytes                                                            */
00075 #define _EP0LEN             (64)
00076 
00077 
00078 //    <h> Control Endpoint0 Interrupt Enable Settings (EP0IER)
00079 //      <o0.0> OUT Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (OTRXIE)
00080 //      <o0.1> OUT Data Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ODRXIE) (Default)
00081 //      <o0.2> OUT Data Buffer Overrun Interrupt Enable (ODOVIE)
00082 //      <o0.3> IN Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ITRXIE)
00083 //      <o0.4> IN Data Packet Transmitted Interrupt Enable (IDTXIE) (Default)
00084 //      <o0.5> NAK Transmitted Interrupt Enable (NAKIE)
00085 //      <o0.6> STALL Transmitted Interrupt Enable (STLIE)
00086 //      <o0.7> USB Error Interrupt Enable (UERIE)
00087 //      <o0.8> SETUP Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (STRXIE)
00088 //      <o0.9> SETUP Data Packet Received Interrupt Enable (SDRXIE) (Default)
00089 //      <o0.10> SETUP Data Error Interrupt Enable (SDERIE)
00090 //      <o0.11> Zero Length Data Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ZLRXIE)
00091 #define _EP0_IER            (0x212)
00092 //    </h>
00093 //  </h>
00094 
00095 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096 /* Endpoint1 Configuration Setting                                                                          */
00097 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 //  <e0> Endpoint1 Configuration
00099 #define _EP1_ENABLE         (0)
00100 
00101 //    <o0> Endpoint Address (EPADR)
00102 //      <1=> 1
00103 //      <2=> 2
00104 //      <3=> 3
00105 //      <4=> 4
00106 //      <5=> 5
00107 //      <6=> 6
00108 //      <7=> 7
00109 #define _EP1_CFG_EPADR      (1)
00110 
00111 //    <o0.0> Endpoint Enable (EPEN)
00112 #define _EP1_CFG_EPEN_TMP   (1)
00113 
00114 //    <o0> Endpoint Transfer Type
00115 //      <2=> Bulk
00116 //      <3=> Interrupt
00117 #define _EP1_TYPR           (3)
00118 
00119 //    <o0> Endpoint Direction (EPDIR)
00120 //      <1=> IN
00121 //      <0=> OUT
00122 #define _EP1_CFG_EPDIR      (1)
00123 
00124 //    <o0> Endpoint Buffer Length (EPLEN) (in byte) <4-64:4>
00125                             /* Maximum: 64 Bytes                                                            */
00126 #define _EP1LEN_TMP         (8)
00127 
00128 //    <h> Endpoint Interrupt Enable Settings (EPIER)
00129 //      <o0> Endpoint Interrupt Enable Settings (EPIER) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00130 //      <o0.0> OUT Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (OTRXIE)
00131 //      <o0.1> OUT Data Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ODRXIE)
00132 //      <o0.2> OUT Data Buffer Overrun Interrupt Enable (ODOVIE)
00133 //      <o0.3> IN Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ITRXIE)
00134 //      <o0.4> IN Data Packet Transmitted Interrupt Enable (IDTXIE)
00135 //      <o0.5> NAK Transmitted Interrupt Enable (NAKIE)
00136 //      <o0.6> STALL Transmitted Interrupt Enable (STLIE)
00137 //      <o0.7> USB Error Interrupt Enable (UERIE)
00138 #define _EP1_IER            (0x10)
00139 // </h>
00140 // </e>
00141 
00142

00273 //      <1=> Double Buffer

00275 
00276 //    <h> Endpoint Interrupt Enable Settings (EPIER)
00277 //      <o0> Endpoint Interrupt Enable Settings (EPIER) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00278 //      <o0.0> OUT Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (OTRXIE)
00279 //      <o0.1> OUT Data Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ODRXIE)
00280 //      <o0.2> OUT Data Buffer Overrun Interrupt Enable (ODOVIE)
00281 //      <o0.3> IN Token Packet Received Interrupt Enable (ITRXIE)
00282 //      <o0.4> IN Data Packet Transmitted Interrupt Enable (IDTXIE)
00283 //      <o0.5> NAK Transmitted Interrupt Enable (NAKIE)
00284 //      <o0.6> STALL Transmitted Interrupt Enable (STLIE)

00287 // </h>
00288 // </e>
